text: Whenever, at a party, I have been in the mood to study fools, I have always looked for a great beauty: they always gather round her like flies around a fruit stall.
author: Jean Paul

text: The first show I ever did, singing and dancing, was 'Beauty and the Beast.' I was playing Gaston. Gaston has red tights, knee high boots, and it's very physical. I had headaches every day for two months.
author: Hugh Jackman

text: A bachelor never quite gets over the idea that he is a thing of beauty and a boy forever.
author: Helen Rowland

text: Beauty and brains, pleasure and usability - they should go hand in hand.
author: Donald Norman

text: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.
author: Rashida Jones
